leve.name: Yellow Is the New Black
leve.description: Our friends in Ishgard have learned that the Yellow Serpents strike swift and true. So keenly do they seek our fangs and venom that they offer favored terms for chocobo export. An Ishgardian bird in hand is worth two in Vylbrand. Adventurers, be our venom in this thrust. Join the pale dragoons of Whitebrim in crushing the demons.
leve.client: The Order of the Twin Adder Yellow Serpents
